job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: pstrongWHAT WE DOstrongppEvery second 3248 parcels are shipped globallypp10 fail to reach their destination on timeppAn incredible 466000 parcels per dayppThats a lot of unhappy customersppbrppCoros provides visibility into shipment accuracy so that shippers and carriers get your parcel to you on time If youve been frustrated by late delivery then come and help us fix it for everyoneppbrppWe use visual imagery to create ground truth data for the supply chain at Fortune 50 scale we engineer systems that deliver 999 accuracy when tracking fastmoving objects and we guarantee enterpriseclass reliability and availability to our customersppbrppCoros is a seedstage company with clearly defined MVP and early customers that have validated productmarket fit Our reference customers are household brands helping harden our services for scaleppnbspppstrongABOUT THE JOBstrongppAs a Site Reliability Engineer you will be part of the growing Coros software groupnbspWe have teams working on embedded systems computer vision machine learning mobile applications and web interfaces and servicesnbspWe use a variety of tools which we regularly evaluate to make sure developer productivity is protected if not enhancednbspWe rely heavily on automationppnbspppnbspppstrongABOUT YOUstrongppResponsibilitiesppnbsppolliConstruct andor improve continuous build and continuous deployment software for Coros internal and customerfacing cloud servicesliliWrite and review software architecture proposals for compliance with cloud best practicesliliHelp build a response procedure for handling outages of upstream and downstream servicesliliAssist product team with development of cost model for customerfacing cloud computing usageliolpbrppQualificationsppnbsppolliBachelors degree andor Masters degree preferably in Computer Science or equivalent experienceliliProficiency in Python or Go programming with CS trainingnbspFamiliarity with Terraform desirableliliExperience with Kubernetesbased cloud managementliliRecent participation in cloud deployments on a Tier 1 cloud service providerliliExcited about working in a fastpaced dynamic startup environmentliolpbrppCoros is your opportunity to join a fastgrowing preseries A startup solving realworld problems Our management has built successful startups so we understand worklife balance dont take ourselves too seriously and value everyoneppbrppemCoros is committed to equal employment opportunities and to provide employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassmentnbspAll employment decisions are based on business needs job requirements and individual qualifications Coros encourages applicants of all agesemppemnbspemppstrongemNOTE TO RECRUITERSemstrongppemCoros will not accept unsolicited resumes from any source other than directly from a candidate Any unsolicited resumes sent to Coros including unsolicited resumes sent to a Coros mailing address fax machine or email address directly to Coros employees or to the Coros resume database will be considered Coros property Coros will NOT pay a fee for any placement resulting from the receipt of an unsolicited resume Coros will consider any candidate for whom an Agency has submitted an unsolicited resume to have been referred by the Agency free of any charges or feesemp
